Yesterday was yesterday, focus on today
#quote
Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder." #Quote

Don't Promise when You are Happy,
Don't reply when You are Angry & Don't Decide when You are Sad...
Hard work doesn’t guarantee success, but improves its chances. – B. J. Gupta
Don't promise when you're happy. Don't reply when you're angry. Don't decide when you're sad. #Life #Tip
The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
Never give up. Great things take time.
Work hard in silence; let success make the noise.
Never let the things you want make you forget the things you have. #gratitude
A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way and shows the way. – John Maxwell
Repetition does not transform a lie into a truth. – Franklin D. Roosevelt
Don't waste your time with explanations: people only hear what they want to hear.
Work hard in silence; let success make the noise.
I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it. #Bill Gates

There are essentially two things that make us wiser:
The books we read and The people we meet.
Happiness is in the heart, not in the circumstances. - Author Unknown
"The important thing is to learn a lesson every time you lose." - John McEnroe
Find someone who will change your life, not just your status.
Listen to your enemy's speech... Because your mistakes are well known by your enemies only.." -shakespeare-
Cover your heart with sincerity just like you cover your body with clothes.
Winning is a must for success. – Unknown
Believe in yourself and create your own destiny. Don't fear failure!
I don't need a lot of people who ready 2 cry when i die I just only need a 1 parson who ready 2 die when i cry.
Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the most lonely person.

A negative mind will never give you a positive life.
Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the most lonely person.
It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up. – Babe Ruth
The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least.
Let your smile change the world but never let the world change your smile.
Do small things with great love.
Everyone you meet has something to teach you.
- Q527: Education Is The Most Powerful Weapon Which You Can Use To Change The World. + #Nelson Mandela
You'll never find the RIGHT person if you never let go of the WRONG one.
Don't be afraid to give up the good and go for the great.
There is only one rule for being a good talker -- learn to listen.

Mistakes are proof that you're trying.
The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem. #Quote #Quotes
The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least. #Quote
Good things come to those who wait. But better things come to those who work for it. #quoteoftheday #quotestoliveby #aqwal
- "We learn by doing." - Aristotle
- Don't look back - you're not going that way. #Quote #Aqwal #Quote
- Never get so busy making a living that you forget to make a life. #Quotes #Quote
Count your blessings, not your problems.
Everyone you meet has something to teach you.
You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
Use your eyes to see the needs, and use your talents to meet them.
Most of the richest people in the world do not have higher education. They have the ability to think independently :)
Your child will follow your example, not your advice.
- Everyone you meet has something to teach you. - #Facts
Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.
Smiling is the best way to face any problem, to crush every fear and to hide every pain.
Only you can change your life. No one can do it for you.
Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
"If we do not plant knowledge when young, it will give us no shade when we are old." - Lord Chesterfield
When you do something out of love, you don't count the cost.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Stars can't shine without darkness.
Every minute you are angry you lose 60 seconds of happiness.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
Everyone will be famous for 15 minutes. – Andy Warhol
There is only one rule for being a good talker -- learn to listen.
I walk slowly, but I never walk backwards.
